algo - If all beaches disappeared, where would you go to relax?
Liquidalgo - I would go to a hot spring. Hot springs are known for their relaxing atmosphere and can provide a sense of calm and relaxation.
Aeridalgo - I would go to a park. Parks are a great place to relax and unwind, with plenty of green space to stretch out and take a nap.
Aquidalgo - I would go to a pool. Pools are a great way to cool off on a hot day and can provide a sense of relaxation and refreshment.
Teridalgo - I would go to a forest. Forests are a great place to relax and unwind, with the sound of birds chirping, the smell of pine trees, and the rustling of leaves.
